::Zenyak/Striker::

Zenyak screams as Iron Raptor's teeth tear metal chunks out of his body. He 
tries to beat back he head with his hands but it is no use.

Trying to turn around, Zenyak manages to see Striker fly in, stopping a safe 
distance above Iron Raptor. "Striker! Help me, please!" He yells desperately 
at the maximal above, yelling in pain as another chunk is torn out of his 
flesh.

Striker laughs. "You? Help you, Zenyak? Why should any maximal help a 
predacon such as you?" He asks, not moving from his place.

"Please!! AAAAAHHH!!! Call it off!!" Zenyak screams in pain and frustration 
as some more of his flesh is torn away.

Striker chuckles. "I think I don't have any authority here, Zenyak. You'll 
have to find your own means," he says, grinning slightly.

Zenyak screams out some curses. "Jet's, maximum burn!" he yells, activating 
the jetpack on his back in order to try to get away.
